status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

Thanks for the report and patch!  Fix looks fine.  It could use Collections.emptyList but that's not a must-fix.

Would you mind adding a unit test?  It's trivial in this case since the test just needs to invoke the method with a null args parameter.  That way if someone later refactors the method a test will verify this doesn't regress.

[~jlowe] - Attached patch 002 to address review comments.

[~ljain] - Thanks for reporting the issue and letting me take it.
